t = input()
for i in range(t):
    a = raw_input()
    b = raw_input()
    if len(a)!=len(b):
        print "NO"
        continue
    i = 0
    toggle = 1
    while i<len(a):
        dummy = a[i:]+a[:i]
        if dummy==b:
            print "YES"
            toggle = 0
            break
        i+=1
    if toggle:
        print "NO"
